https://studio.code.org/s/dance-ai-2023/.long_instructions: Watch this video, then go on to the next level.

https://studio.code.org/s/dance-ai-2023/.short_instructions: **Create your dancer and code them do a new dance move!** Click Run to start dancing.
https://studio.code.org/s/dance-ai-2023/.long_instructions: **Add blocks to create your dancer and code them to do a new dance move!** - Click Run to start dancing.

authored_hints.HInt2: The dancer should be the same on both blocks and the sequence (order) is important.
authored_hints.validation: üí° Add these blocks to setup to create your first dancer: "CAT" {x: 200, y: 200} "CAT" "next" -1

https://studio.code.org/s/dance-ai-2023/.short_instructions:
**A.I. is here to find the best effect for your dance party!**
Connect the `AI generate effect` block to setup then click on the block to get started.
https://studio.code.org/s/dance-ai-2023/.long_instructions: **A.I. is here to find the best effect for your dance party!** - Connect the AI generate effect block to setup. - Click on the block to get started.

authored_hints.Hint2: üí° Connect the [blockly block][0] into setup. Then click on it to get started.
authored_hints.Hint3: üí° If you want to regenerate the effect or change the emojis you can click on the `A.I. generate effect` block again.

https://studio.code.org/s/dance-ai-2023/.short_instructions: **Use A.I. to generate a new effect for a different song.**
https://studio.code.org/s/dance-ai-2023/.long_instructions:
**Use A.I. to generate a new effect for a different song.**

-   Choose new emojis to generate a new effect.

authored_hints.Hint1: üí° Listen to the song and think about the mood of the music.
authored_hints.Hint2: üí° Connect the [blockly block][0] into setup. Then click on it to get started.
authored_hints.Hint3: üí° If you want to regenerate the effect or change the emojis you can click on the `A.I. generate effect` block again.

https://studio.code.org/s/dance-ai-2023/.short_instructions:
**You can customize the effect A.I. creates!**
Click the emojis on the block. Then either `Regenerate`, `Use Code`, or `Start Over`.
https://studio.code.org/s/dance-ai-2023/.long_instructions:
**A.I. gets you started. You can customize the effect it creates!**

-   Click the emojis to try one of these: 

    -   `Regenerate`  A.I. will recommend a different effect based on the same emojis.

    -   `Use Code`  Use the code A.I. writes and customize it! 

    -   `Start Over`  Choose three new emojis to generate a new effect.

authored_hints.Hint1:
üí° Customize the effect by clicking emojis on the <xml> <block xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml" type="Dancelab_ai" id="*6NOt^DsApsRC-pPZKBQ">
  <field name="VALUE">{"inputs":["cool","cold","wavy"],"backgroundEffect":"sparkles","backgroundColor":"cool","foregroundEffect":"bubbles"}</field>

</block> </xml> block in the workspace.
authored_hints.HintEdit: üí° If you would like to use the code A.I. writes, toggle to show the code and then click `Use Code`. The blocks will replace the `A.I. generate effect` block in your workspace.
authored_hints.Hint2: üí° **Still stuck?** Watch the video to see how you can customize the effect.

https://studio.code.org/s/dance-ai-2023/.short_instructions:
**Try it out!** 
Press Run. Then press the right or left arrow ‚óÄ ‚ñ∂ to cue your dancers to move.
https://studio.code.org/s/dance-ai-2023/.long_instructions: **Try it out! You control the dance moves.** - Press Run to start the song. - Then press the right or left arrow ‚óÄ ‚ñ∂ to cue your dancers to move.

authored_hints.hint1: üí° Your dancers won‚Äôt respond to your cues unless the dance is running.
authored_hints.hint2: üí° After you press Run, cue your dancers by pressing the ‚óÄ ‚ñ∂ right or left arrow.

https://studio.code.org/s/dance-ai-2023/.short_instructions: **Code your dancer to move when you press a key.**
https://studio.code.org/s/dance-ai-2023/.long_instructions: **Your turn! Code your dancer to move when you press a key.** - Attach sprites do dance move under the when up pressed event. - Make sure to press the ‚ñ≤ button or your ‚Äúup arrow‚Äù key after clicking Run.

authored_hints.hint1: üí° **Still stuck?** Watch the events video again to learn how they work.
authored_hints.hint2:
üí° Here‚Äôs an example of what your code could look like. <xml>
<xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml">

  <block type="Dancelab_whenKey" id="*R3Us3z5;rM#sBE?1zjX" deletable="false" x="19" y="221">
    <field name="KEY">"up"</field>
    <next>
      <block type="Dancelab_doMoveEachLR" id="*hCDocpHXqlku@f[[rK=">
        <field name="GROUP">"BEAR"</field>
        <field name="MOVE">MOVES.Dab</field>
        <field name="DIR">-1</field>
      </block>
    </next>
  </block>
</xml>

https://studio.code.org/s/dance-ai-2023/.short_instructions: **Try it out:** The effects change at specific times in the song!
https://studio.code.org/s/dance-ai-2023/.long_instructions: **Try it out: The effects change at specific times in the song!** - Press Run to start the song. - Watch the effects change at measure 3 and again at measure 5.

https://studio.code.org/s/dance-ai-2023/.short_instructions: **Code your dance to change effects at specific times in the song.**
https://studio.code.org/s/dance-ai-2023/.long_instructions: **Your turn! Code your dance to change effects at specific times in the song.** - Connect an AI generate effect block to the at 2 measures event in your workspace. - Press Run to watch the effect change at measure 2.

authored_hints.hint1:
Connect a `AI generate effect` block to the `at 2 measures` event in your workspace like this: 

[blockly block][0]
authored_hints.hint2: Click on the [blockly block][0]  block to make a new effect.

callouts.dance_callout_02: Add the AI generate effect block here.

**Get creative!**
Now use A.I. and the skills you just learned to code your dance party.
https://studio.code.org/s/dance-ai-2023/.long_instructions:
### **Nice work!**

-   Now use A.I. and the skills you just learned to code your dance party. Get creative!
